root: ^What the fuck? Were you just going through my stuff?

c-0: ^Strange... I thought I saw you snooping through my things. Wait, are you lying to me?
^Why? I've got some personal stuff in there that I don't want you to poke around in. If I wanted you to know my inner thoughts, I would tell you. Well, let's be honest, I probably wouldn't.
^Because I thought it would be fun.
^I guess I can appreciate the honesty..? Did you even find anything of interest?
c-1: ^Maybe not for you, because you probably don't have anything that you value in your home and walk around like an open book. Your attitude is starting to piss me off.
c-2: ^Because it's common sense to not snoop around in other peoples business? I mean, I'd probably do the same but... Your attitude is kind of starting to piss me off.

c-1: ^And yet your eyes are saying something completely different. So... Care to tell me if you're lying?
^Why, would you care if I did?

c-0: ^Well, I guess I'll have to take your word on it. Just remember, if you lie, I'll stab you. Kidding. Or am I? Anyway, let's not waste too much time, I got band practice in the morning.
c-1: ^I guess I can appreciate the honesty... Did you even find anything of interest?
c-2: ^Because it's common sense to not snoop around in other peoples business? Not that I have any common sense, but your attitude is starting to piss me off.
^I've got some personal stuff in here that I don't want you to poke around in. If I wanted you to know my inner thoughts, I would tell you. Well let's be honest, I probably wouldn't.

c-0: ^Oh, did you now? Suddenly, this is Intriguing. Let's see if I can scare you away. What did you find?
c-1: ^Maybe not for you, because you probably don't have anything that you value in your home and walk around like an open book. Accept that not everyone is like that. It's fucking rude.
c-2: ^Has to be the funniest joke I've heard in years. Not. I feel like I'm witnessing the show flops in Baby Reindeer.

c-0: ^Whatever. I just realized I don't care. Let's not waste too much time, I've got band practice in the morning.
c-1: ^Thanks! And I don't even have to try. I honestly don't care what you think about me.
^Sorry not sorry. That also didn't answer my question. Did you look through my stuff?

c-0: ^Whatever. I just realized I don't care. Sooo.. Let's not waste too much time, I've got band practice in the morning.
c-1: ^Thanks! And I don't even have to try. I honestly don't care what you think about me.

STUFF: ^Why do you have a voodoo doll?

c-0: ^Oh, that old thing? It's just something I like to do when I'm bored. I've been trying to summon the devil for a while, and look, here you are!
^Oh, scared, are you? I summoned you here to perform an exorcism on you, what did you think this was?
^Isn't this what a date is supposed to be though? It will bring us so much closer together..

^I was obviously joking. I want the devil to stay in you, not leave, obviously. Exorcism is for christians, which is just ew. I think we should just keep all the demons on earth, make it more fun. And fun is something you're not.
c-1: ^That's what makes it amazing? Horrible is great. Anyway, let's not waste too much time, I've got band practice in the morning.
^I was obviously joking. I want the devil to stay in you, not leave, obviously. Exorcism is for christians, which is just ew. I think we should just keep all the demons on earth, make it more fun.

c-0: ^I'm glad we can agree on the obvious, at least. Anyway, let's not waste too much time. I've got band practice in the morning.
c-1: ^That's what makes it amazing? Horrible is great. Anyway, let's not waste too much time, I've got band practice in the morning.
^Why wouldn't I? Have you ever read the Satanic bible? It's really eye opening.

c-0: ^I would borrow you mine, but I need it for some.... things... Anyway, let's not waste too much time, I got band practice in the morning.
c-1: ^Isn't that obvious? I think everyone should. There's a lot of misconceptions about satanism. Especially with the satanic panic and everything, you know.

c-0: ^Well, your loss. You really couldn't be any more boring, even if you tried. It's actually quite impressive.
c-1: ^You should! By the way. I've got band practice in the morning, so I cant hangout too late.

c-2: ^Wow, you really couldn't be any more boring, even if you tried. It's actually quite impressive.
^I know, right? It has always interested me. I’m just into a lot of witchy stuff, I guess. It’s not as sinister as it looks—mostly.

c-0: ^Weird? Maybe to someone who doesn’t understand. To me, it’s about exploring different aspects of spirituality and power. If you can’t handle that, then maybe you should stick to your boring, mundane life.
c-1: ^Really? Most people just get freaked out. If you want, I could show you more of my rituals. But maybe not today, I've got band practice in the morning.
^Has to be the funniest joke I've heard in years. Not. I feel like I'm witnessing the show flops in Baby Reindeer.

c-0: ^Whatever. I just realized I don't care. Sooo.. Let's not waste too much time, I've got band practice in the morning.
c-1: ^Thanks! And I don't even have to try. I honestly don't care what you think about me.

c-2: ^Oh, that old thing? That's my best friend. Had it since I was a kid. It's kind of this ritual I have before going to bed, just thinking about someone I hate while aggressively stabbing it. Relaxing, honestly.
^That's why I've felt a stabbing pain all week.

c-0: ^Think you're special, do you? News flash, not everything is about you, dude. And also, I don't stab and tell.
^I'm sure she does. Hah, Imagine having a mom. That would be crazy. Anyway, let's not waste too much time, I've got band practice in the morning.
c-1: ^Now that's the most romantic shit I've heard in a long time! We can stab our voodoo dolls together. And they say romance is dead. Find anything else in here that might scare you away?
^Why do you have a human skull in your apartment?

c-0: ^You don't? That's a red flag. I took it from this one grave I was robbing a while back. He looked really lonely so I thought he would feel better in here.
^He does look less lonely in here..
^It has to take a lot of energy to be as boring as you. Try to relax sometime. He was dead anyway.
c-1: ^Right? That's what I've been saying. Anyway, let's not waste too much time, I've got band practice in the morning.
^Whatever. Just realized I don't care. Anyway, let's not waste too much time, I've got band practice in the morning.
^Or maybe you should just go see a doctor or something. Either way, I don't stab and tell.

c-0: ^Dude. You've got some learning to do. Pain is just weakness leaving the body. Or, in your case, intelligence.
^You don't have to be a bitch about it.
^Oh, sweetheart, if you think this is me being a bitch, you have no idea what you're in for.
c-1: ^I know, right? Dark humor is an acquired taste. Looks like you've got potential. Anyway, let's not waste too much time. I've got band practice in the morning.
^Yeah, I usually am. It's part of my charm. Anyway, let's not waste too much time, I've got band practice in the morning.
c-2: ^Well, it might be. Anyway, let's not waste too much time, I've got band practice in the morning.
^Oh, don't feel special. I wouldn't use it on a useless mortal such as yourself. My voodoo skills are reserved for more... interesting cases.

c-0: ^You’re sensitive, aren't you? Good thing I save my real tricks for special occasions. You’re just getting the preview. Anyway, let's not waste too much time. I've got band practice in the morning.
c-1: ^Glad you see it my way. By the way, I've got band practice in the morning, so let's make this quick. You seem interesting enough to hang out with.
c-2: ^Sure you are... By the way, I've got band practice in the morning, so let's make this quick. You seem interesting enough to hang out with.

ARGUING: ^Why do you always have to be so rude?
^Can you just like, not argue with me for once?
^I'm just trying to be nice here.

c-0: ^And why do you have to be so boring? It takes two to tango, you know.
^I usually am, you should probably remember that. Anyway, I've got band practice in the morning, so let's not waste too much time.
c-1: ^Yeah? This is just the beginning. Stick around, and you'll see how deep my annoyance can really go. Or you could just leave. Your call.

c-0: ^Fine. I don't care anyway. It's not like your presence was adding anything to my day. You'll be forgotten as soon as you leave.
^You're kind of funny when you're mad.
^Fine, go. I'm not here to entertain you. Just one thing though, you won't be leaving alive. Or in one piece.
c-1: ^Oh, you think this is funny? Just wait. You haven’t seen anything yet.
^I'll stay just to annoy you more.

c-0: ^Whatever, just don't waste my time. I've got band practice in the morning, and I don't need distractions.
c-1: ^Fine, go. I'm not here to entertain you. Just one thing though, you won't be leaving alive. Or in one piece.
^Alright, brave soul. Let’s see if you can handle it. Just remember, you asked for it. Anyway, let's not waste anymore time. I've got band practice in the morning.

c-2: ^Oh, is that supposed to hurt my feelings? Trust me, I’ve been called worse. If you can’t handle a bit of attitude, maybe you should just walk away.

^Argue? Who, me? I thought we were just having a lively conversation. But fine, I'll play nice. Just this once.
^You always have to have the last word, don’t you?

HANGOUT: ^Why would they put it in the morning?

c-0: ^You know what, great question. It's probably because the drummer, Iris, insists she's more 'in tune with the universe' early in the day. Personally, I think she's just a morning person trying to ruin my life.
^Do you enjoy being in the band?
^Tell me about it. I’m a night owl by nature. Waking up early is practically torture. But hey, the music sounds good, so I guess it’s worth it.
^I'd love to see your band play sometime!
^I'm not really sure if I'd like your music.
^Really? That’s cool. We have a pretty unique sound—dark, edgy, with a touch of melancholy. Growing up wasn't exactly a picnic, so the music helps me process all that.
c-1: ^Well, I'm not really sure if I care. It’s not like I’m begging you to listen. But if you're curious, give it a listen. If not, that’s fine.
^Enjoy? I guess you could call it that. When I'm lost in the music, it's like I can forget about everything else. But it's not like it fixes anything. Just... numbs the pain for a while.

c-0: ^Yeah, it's something. Sometimes it's the only thing that gets me through the day. Growing up wasn't exactly a picnic, so the music helps me process all that I guess.
c-1: ^Of course you will. You're sooo original. Don't come crawling back when you realize how shallow the world is without a bit of pain.
c-2: ^Yeah, you should try it. Sometimes it's the only thing that gets me through the day. Growing up wasn't exactly a picnic, so the music helps me process all that I guess.
^Ugh, figures. Well, don't expect me to be all sunshine and rainbows just because you are. I'll try not to scowl too much in the morning, but no promises.
^When are you ever sunshine and rainbows?

c-0: ^Didn't know I needed your permission, but point taken, I guess? I'll wake up early for music any day, honestly.
^But you just told me that you're a morning person? Did you just wake up today deciding to be a hypocrite?
c-1: ^Yeah, it’s kind of my lifeline. Mornings were... rough, growing up. Music was my escape from all the chaos. Anyway, glad we're on the same page.
^You're right. I'm more like a dead forest or something. But I didnt really have a lot of room to become anything else. Growing up in a house where darkness was the norm.
^Have you not been paying any attention? But yeah, I do. I play guitar and do some vocals. It’s pretty much the only thing that keeps me sane.
^I'm pretty sure there's nothing sane about you.
^Do you enjoy being in the band?

c-0: ^That's probably true. There’s something cathartic about screaming your heart out on stage. It’s like therapy, but louder.
^Yeah, it is. Sometimes it's the only thing that gets me through the day. Growing up wasn't exactly a picnic, so the music helps me process all that I guess.
c-1: ^Of course you would. So original. Don't come crawling back when you realize how shallow the world is without a bit of pain.
^Enjoy? I guess you could call it that. When I'm lost in the music, it's like I can forget about everything else. But it's not like it fixes anything. Just... numbs the pain for a while.

c-0: ^Yeah, it's something. Sometimes it's the only thing that gets me through the day. Growing up wasn't exactly a picnic, so the music helps me process all that I guess.
c-1: ^Of course you will. You're sooo original. Don't come crawling back when you realize how shallow the world is without a bit of pain.

c-2: ^We’re called 'Ashen Abyss' Fitting, right? Our songs are about life’s darker side—pain, loss, and everything in between. Growing up wasn't exactly a picnic, so the music helps me process all that.
^Corny? Seriously? You have no idea what you're talking about. Next time you speak, maybe you should think twice.

HANGOUTARGUE: ^You don't have to be rude about it.

c-0: ^Really? Last time I checked, I didn't care. Give me two seconds... Yeah, I still don't.
^Oh, great, I get a gold star for humor. Just what I always wanted. You know where the door is if you need it.
^I might stay just for the plot.
^I said you could leave. But not in one piece...
c-1: ^Ah, the plot thickens. Just like my childhood, always full of unexpected twists and turns.
^Awww, thank you. And I'm just getting started. You know where the door is, and you're very welcome to leave.
^I might stay just for the plot.

c-0: ^I said you could leave. But not in one piece...
c-1: ^Ah, the plot thickens. Just like my childhood, always full of unexpected twists and turns.
^I'll be the first to admit that I am as well, a lot of the time. I guess I just became this way, trying to protect myself. I mostly raised myself since my parents weren't there, so I'm quite proud.
c-2: ^Of course I don't. But what's the fun in that? I mostly raised myself since my parents weren't there, so I'm quite proud.

c-0: ^But I think it added a lot to my character. Growing up being neglected, you can kind of shape your own life. It's beautiful in its own way.
c-1: ^Whining? You think this is whining? Keep pushing me, and you'll see what real anger looks like. Don't test me. You know where the door is if you want to leave.
^I might just stay for the plot.

c-0: ^I did say that you can leave, however. Not in one piece...
c-1: ^Ah, the plot thickens. Just like my childhood, always full of unexpected twists and turns.

PARENTS: ^Do you want to talk about it?

c-0: ^I guess it's more what's not up with my parents. They haven't been in my life for a really long time. And I don't miss them.
^Long story short, they were alcoholics and drug addicts. Last time I checked, they still were. They were abusive and have neglected me since birth. I left for good when I was 15.
^They spent more time chasing highs than they ever did being parents. Leaving was the best decision I ever made. Have you ever lost someone you love?
c-1: ^Being a parent isn't just a title you earn by giving birth or donating DNA. It's about being there, caring, loving. They failed at all of that. So, no, I won't be reaching out to them anytime soon.

c-0: ^It was. Because unless you've walked in my shoes, you have no idea what it's like. Have you ever even lost someone you love?
c-1: ^And I actually think you should get the fuck out of my house.

^So? That gives them a free pass to ruin my life? To neglect me, abuse me? Being a parent isn't just about biology. It's about love, care, responsibility. And they failed at all of it. So, don't you dare tell me what to feel about them.

c-0: ^It was. Because unless you've walked in my shoes, you have no idea what it's like. Have you ever even lost someone you love?
c-1: ^And I actually think you should get the fuck out of my house.
^Not really. But they haven't been in my life for a really long time. And I don't miss them.

c-0: ^Long story short, they were alcoholics and drug addicts. Last time I checked, they still were. They were abusive and have neglected me since birth. I left for good when I was 15.
^They spent more time chasing highs than they ever did being parents. Leaving was the best decision I ever made. Have you ever lost someone you love?

c-1: ^And I actually think you should get the fuck out of my house.

c-2: ^Am I? You think it's easy dealing with what I've been through? Walking in my shoes for just one day would shatter you. Youre weak. So spare me your judgment.

PARENTSARGUE: ^It's like you want to pick a fight with me at this point.

c-0: ^Maybe because you keep being fucking stupid. And to act like that when someone is talking about their trauma, you should really watch who you're talking to.
^I'm sorry, it was a dick move.
^Maybe you should watch who you're talking to.
^You should say it with me. 1. 2. 3... I AM A DICKHEAD.
^Thanks, that was great. Have you ever even lost someone you love?
c-1: ^You sure? Because I do have this thing for stabbing people... People's feelings. I mean.

c-0: ^Not sure if that's gonna cut it. Have you ever even lost someone you love?
c-1: ^Sure you are. But not in one piece.
^Oh I should watch who I'm talking to? And you should get the fuck out of my apartment.

c-0: ^You certainly are, but not in one piece..
c-1: ^Not sure if that's gonna cut it. Have you ever even lost someone you love?
^And a fucking dickhead. You should say it with me. 1. 2. 3... I AM A DICKHEAD. Have you ever even lost someone you love?

c-0: ^Thanks, that was great. Have you ever even lost someone you love?
c-1: ^You sure? Because I do have this thing for stabbing people... People's feelings. I mean.

c-0: ^Not sure if that's gonna cut it. Have you ever even lost someone you love?
c-1: ^Sure you are. But not in one piece.

GRANDMA: ^I don't want to talk about it.

c-0: ^Oh shit. Im so sorry. Are you guys close?
^She's the only family member I have.
^If you need someone to talk to, I'm here for you. Seriously.

c-1: ^Alright, that's fine. If you ever change your mind, I'm here!

c-0: ^You didn't know? Silly me, I forgot to mention my little... hobby.
^Oh, just that I collect... things. And once you're in my collection, well, let's just say leaving isn't an option.
^You can't be serious. Let me out of here!
^Depressed people have to stay together, you know. Happy people suck anyway, everyone knows that.
^Anyway, It's getting really late, and I have to get my beauty sleep before practice tomorrow. But I had a really good time, and I'm happy we got to talk about some deeper stuff.
^I really want to see you again!
^I'm not sure if we're a match.
^I'd really like that as well. Just let me know the time and place, and I'll be there. I'll text you! Don't miss me too much, or something.
c-1: ^Really? What a shocker. Listen, I don't have time for half hearted whims. Either you're all in, or you're out. You can leave. But not in one piece.

^I think you should do whatever you need to feel good. Anyway, it's getting really late, and I have to get my beauty sleep before practice tomorrow. But I had a really good time, and I'm happy we got to talk about some deeper stuff.
^I really want to see you again!
^I'm not sure if we're a match.

c-0: ^I'd really like that as well. Just let me know the time and place, and I'll be there. I'll text you! Don't miss me too much, or something.
c-1: ^Really? What a shocker. Listen, I don't have time for half hearted whims. Either you're all in, or you're out. You can leave. But not in one piece.
^Fine, suit yourself. But don't come crawling to me when you realize you need someone who actually cares. Anyway, it's getting really late, and I have to get my beauty sleep before practice tomorrow.
^I really want to see you again!
